Today on the East Coast, Aberdeen Harbour is lighting up with a clean 2ft @11s NNE swell and a moderate 12 mph W wind. Best conditions are on the push from 08:47 to 15:34. Tomorrow, conditions drop as the swell weakens to 2ft @5s with fresh 26 mph NW winds, making it blown out. The day after, the swell picks up slightly to 3ft @7s but remains poor with 20 mph NNW winds. Best: today.
